infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow camera access to capture land photos and documents.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: GPS location needed for geo-tagging land images.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: GPS location for accurate land mapping.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Access gallery to upload land documents.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera for land photos and documents.
